channel.title: Adding teleBlocks to portals?
channel.description:
Ok so Ive been trying for the last few minutes to add something that stops you from teleporting on my portals and I just can't get it to work....
So... If I have this :
[code]case 7318: // memberportal teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You teleport to the object training area."); break;[/code]
And I wan't to add teleblocks and some thing that sats [code]sendMessage("A magical force stops you from telepotring");[/code]
Basically all I wan't to know are the [code]if(teleBlock == true)[/code] crap... How though? It wouldn't go in like that...

item.title: Adding teleBlocks to portals?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Ok so Ive been trying for the last few minutes to add something that stops you from teleporting on my portals and I just can’t get it to work…

So…
If I have this :

case 7318: // memberportal teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You teleport to the object training area."); break;

And I wan’t to add teleblocks and some thing that sats

sendMessage("A magical force stops you from telepotring");

Basically all I wan’t to know are the

if(teleBlock == true)

crap…
How though?
It wouldn’t go in like that…

Read full topic
